name: Cou Cou and Flying Fish
description: The national dish of Barbados, Cou Cou and Flying Fish is a meal made with cornmeal and okra, served with seasoned flying fish.

name: Macaroni Pie
description: Macaroni pie is a popular side dish in Barbados made with macaroni, cheese, and various seasonings.

name: Fish Cakes
description: Fish cakes are a popular snack food in Barbados made with salted codfish and various seasonings.

name: Pudding and Souse
description: Pudding and souse is a traditional Bajan dish made with steamed sweet potato and pickled pork.

name: Bajan Pepperpot
description: Bajan Pepperpot is a hearty stew made with various meats, okra, and spices.

name: Conkies
description: Conkies are a traditional Barbadian dessert made with cornmeal, coconut, pumpkin, and various spices.

name: Guava Cheese
description: Guava cheese is a sweet dessert made with guava pulp and sugar, often served as a snack in Barbados.
